item.title: Working with remote machines
item.description: As a heavy shell user, I typically try to reduce the number of keystrokes required to fulfill a certain task. As I am working a lot with remote machines, I am logging into those machines pretty often. Problem statement In order to log into a remote machine, I am using the ssh command. The typical command is ssh <user>@192.168.0.123, if the user is named differently on the other machine. I am often facing the following problems:
